subcategories.name: instructional rewriting
subcategories.description: Rewrite a given text with a specific instruction.
subcategories.structure: This is a guided rewrite task. First, output the rewritten content. And then output a list to present what has been changed and why it changed

subcategories.name: language polishing
subcategories.description: Polish a piece of text to make it more fluent, natural, and readable.
subcategories.structure: It's a language polishing task. First, output the polished content. And then output a list to present what has been changed and why it changed.

subcategories.name: paraphrasing
subcategories.structure: First, analyse the question and give a brief analysis in the first paragraph. Then output the answer. Next, use a list to give explanations. Last, give a conclusion.

subcategories.name: text correction
subcategories.description: Correct the potential errors in a piece of text.
subcategories.structure: This is a text correction task. First, output the corrected content. And then output a list to present what has been changed and why it changed.
